thread.title: Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown
thread.title_full: Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown

author: JANIE McCAULEY
title: Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown
text:
Jeff Chiu Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw, right, hugs catcher A.J. Ellis (17) after beating the San Francisco Giants in a baseball game in San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. The Dodgers won 8-0 to clinch the National League West division. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Jeff Chiu Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw celebrates after the Dodgers beat the San Francisco Giants 8-0 in a baseball game in San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. The Dodgers clinched the National League West division. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Jeff Chiu Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw, center, celebrates with teammates in the locker room after the Dodgers beat the San Francisco Giants in a baseball game in San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. The Dodgers won 8-0 to clinch the National League West division. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Jeff Chiu Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown 
Los Angeles Dodgers' Enrique Hernandez (14) is congratulated by manager Don Mattingly, left, after scoring against the San Francisco Giants during the first inning of a baseball game in San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Jeff Chiu Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw throws against the San Francisco Giants during the second inning of a baseball game in San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Jeff Chiu Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw, right, hugs catcher A.J. Ellis (17) after beating the San Francisco Giants 8-0 in a baseball game in San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Jeff Chiu Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw, right, hugs catcher A.J. Ellis (17) after beating the San Francisco Giants in a baseball game in San Francisco, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. The Dodgers won 8-0 to clinch the National League West division. (AP Photo/Jeff Chiu) Posted: Wednesday, September 30, 2015 9:59 pm | Updated: 10:45 pm, Wed Sep 30, 2015. Dodgers finally secure third straight NL West crown Associated Press | 
SAN FRANCISCO (AP) â€” Andrew Friedman arrived at Chavez Ravine last October and built the big-spending Dodgers' $285 million roster to win championships, not merely division titles. 
And, lately at least, that means trying to get through the pesky St. Louis Cardinals - the team that sent Los Angeles home from the postseason the past two years.   kAm(9:=6 E96 4@C<D 7=6H 2?5 366C 7=@H65 E@ 46=63C2E6 2 E9:C5 DEC2:89E }{ (6DE E:E=6 %F6D52J ?:89E[ @FE7:6=56C r2C= rC2H7@C5 9@==6C65 @FE 2 86?E=6 C6>:?56Ci QyFDE E96 7:CDE DE6APQk^Am kAm%96 s@586CD 92G6?VE C624965 E96 (@C=5 $6C:6D D:?46 H:??:?8 :E 2== 282:?DE E96 ~2<=2?5 pE9=6E:4D :? `hgg[ =@D:?8 6:89E A@DED62D@?
